info:
The sub-projects, collectively the Project, proposed for financing under the requested PFR are i) an electricity transmission sub-project in the North West Afghanistan to extend the network and connect to the Turkmenistan (TKM) system, and ii) an electricity distribution sub-project to extend the distribution network south east of Kabul.

The transmission sub-project will include a 500kV transmission line from the TKM border to Andkhoy and from Andkhoy to Sheberghan and a 220kV transmission line from Sheberghan to Mazar-e-Sharif.  220kV substations will be constructed at Andkhoy and Sheberghan and the existing 220kV substation at Mazar-e-Sharif will be expanded.

The distribution sub-project will include 20kV lines and substations and low voltage network at Pul-e-Alam (Logar) and Gardez (Paktia).
name: MFF:ENERGY SECTOR DEVELOPMENT_INVESTMENT_PROGRAM-P
